entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 5.
